entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
